Package org.newsclub.net.unix.selftest

Class Selftest

java.lang.Object
org.newsclub.net.unix.selftest.Selftest
public class Selftest extends Object
Performs a series of self-tests. Specifically, we run all unit tests of junixsocket-core and junixsocket-rmi. NOTE: The Selftest will fail when run from within Eclipse due to test classes not being present. Invoke via java -jar junixsocket-selftest-...-jar-with-dependencies.jar.
Author:
Christian Kohlschütter
